fields.title: Guilherme Pereira
fields.short_description: Full-stack web developer, software analyst, data science apprentice and stock market enthusiast.
fields.about_me: Hello, I am an analyst and systems developer with more than 8 years of experience, working on different types of projects, from the development of websites and e-commerce systems to APIs and back-end systems. Also, i have different levels of knowledge in various programming languages. Currently studying Data Science at DataCamp, developing solutions with Node.js, Vue.js, Nuxt.js and e-commerces with WordPress / WooCommerce.
fields.education:
• Degree in Analysis and Systems Development
  • Post-Graduate in Analysis and Systems Development
  • Post-Graduate in Social Media and Digital Management
  • In progress courses: 
    • Data Science with Python - Datacamp
    • Nuxt.js and Vue.js in Udemy
